Uses of Package
com.android.slackandhay.gameobject

Packages that use com.android.slackandhay.gameobject
com.android.slackandhay This package contains everything. 
com.android.slackandhay.gameobject This package contains the game object, its factory, manager as well as its state manager 
com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component This package contains all components the game object can have to extend its functionality 
com.android.slackandhay.gameobject.component.preset This package contains presets for the game components e.g. 
com.android.slackandhay.grid This package contains all the classes concerning the grid, which is used to position objects in the world 
com.android.slackandhay.scene This package contains all classes of our OpenGL rendering engine 
 

Classes in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject used by com.android.slackandhay
GOGameObject
          This class represents the most fundamental object we created to represent objects inside the game, they can be extended with components
 

Classes in com.android.slackandhay.gameobject used by com.android.slackandhay.gameobject
GOGameObject
          This class represents the most fundamental object we created to represent objects inside the game, they can be extended with components
GOGameObjectFactory
          Creates Subclasses of the Components and the State Manager to create a new Game Object
GOState
          This enum represents a state inside the state manager
GOState.StateType
           
GOStateManager
          This class implements the state manager which handles the state of a game object
